trans-unit.source: Specifies which properties should be reported by type descriptors, specifically the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(System.Object)"></xref> method.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] supports an internal mechanism that limits the number of properties on a type that are returned by the custom <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type descriptor.
If the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is found, the type descriptor narrows the scope of returned properties.

<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> differs from typical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattrsharpplural-md.md)] because you cannot apply it to a class as metadata.
The filter mechanism works through code instead of through static metadata.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> class.
The options that describe this property filter.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

Returns a value that indicates whether the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is equal to a specified object.
This implementation compares the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> values on each <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> for value equality.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions> are the same, then the two <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> instances are equal.
The object to compare to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>.

`true` if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the filter options for this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].

The value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A> is the same value as was provided for the `filter` constructor argument when this <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute> was constructed.
There is no other means of setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Filter%2A> value.
The property filter options.
Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
A signed 32-bit integer value.

Returns a value that indicates whether the property filter options of the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] match the property filter options of the provided object.

For attributes that store flags, which is true for <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute>, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Match%2A> result may be different from an <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute.Equals%2A> result.

For example, a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.SetValues> matches a filter of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All>, because <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterOptions.All> is a merge of all filter values.
The object to compare.
This object is expected to be a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyFilterAttribute"></xref>.
`true` if a match exists; otherwise, `false`.
